name: The Legend of The Darkest Night
name_original: The Legend of The Darkest Night
description:
First, the important note, read before you play: before you play the downloadable version of the game, you should play the browser version!

Furthermore, downloadable version is not a version, you play in browser. Browser version is a prequel to the main game, which you need to download!

This game is an action shooter platformer, with a lot of interesting things.

Make your way to the final of the game, find all the secrets.

After completing the main story you can start playing challenge levels.

Complete the levels, collect power-ups, earn rewards, listen to the music in The Legend of The Darkest Night.

The controls are pretty simple, so it shouldn't be hard to get used to them.

Go on, explore!
